application.name: hist
application.brief: Generates a histogram table of cube in text format
application.description: This program reads a single band from a cube and creates a tabular representation of the histogram. If a band specification is not given for the input file then the program will default to using the first band. The output results can then be viewed in a graphical form by using your favorite spreadsheet (e.g., Excel) or other graphing package (e.g., IDL, GNU plotutils).

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.brief: Single plane of a cube to get statistics from
parameter.description: The file specification for the input cube. The histogram will be calculated for one plane only. The default plane is one (1).

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: Output text file containing the tabular representation of the histogram.

parameter.name: MINIMUM
parameter.description: Minimum DN value in histogram. If not entered it will automatically be computed.

parameter.name: MAXIMUM
parameter.description: Maximum DN value in histogram. If not entered it will automatically be computed.

parameter.name: NBINS
parameter.description: Number of bins in the histogram. If not entered it will automatically be computed.

parameter.name: TITLE
parameter.description: This will be the title for the plot of the histogram. The plot will only be shown in ui mode.

parameter.name: XAXIS
parameter.description: This will be the title for the x axis, which represents the pixel value (or DN), in the plot of the histogram. The plot will only be shown in ui mode.

parameter.name: FREQAXIS
parameter.description: This will be the title for the y axis to the right of the histogram plot, which represents the frequency of the pixel value. The plot will only be shown in GUI mode.

parameter.name: PERCENTAXIS
parameter.description: This will be the title for the y axis to the left of the histogram plot, which represents the percentage of pixel seen so far. The plot will only be shown in GUI mode.
